channel.title: Upgrading MySQL on Run production-grade databases easily on Kubernetes

item.title: Upgrading MySQL Overview
item.description: New to KubeDB? Please start here. This is an Enterprise-only feature. Please install KubeDB Enterprise Edition to try this feature. Upgrading MySQL version Overview This guide will give you an overview of how KubeDB enterprise operator upgrades the version of MySQL database. Before You Begin You should be familiar with the following KubeDB concepts: MySQL MySQLOpsRequest How Upgrade Process Works The following diagram shows how KubeDB enterprise operator used to upgrade the version of MySQL.
